typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrderDetails
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrder
CloudSalesOrderDetails, CloudSalesOrder join(CloudSalesOrderDetails@OrderID == CloudSalesOrders@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinOrdersAndOrderDetails
Select1 derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobalOrderID = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
JoinOrdersAndOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7
	)) ~> Select1
